item.title: BBC looks into the relationship between Cuba and Venezuela
item.description: The BBC's Cuba correspondent, Will Grant, explains what's the nature of the relationship between Venezuela and Cuba.

item.title: US may intercept and seize oil tanker heading for Europe, reports say
item.description: US officials have a warrant to seize the Russian-flagged ship accused of breaking sanctions.

item.title: Six dead and hundreds of flights cancelled as snow causes chaos across Europe
item.description: Hundreds of flights have been cancelled in Amsterdam and Paris, with thousands of people stranded.

item.title: US Congressman Doug LaMalfa dies unexpectedly at 65
item.description: The death of LaMalfa, a Trump ally, shaves the Republican majority in the US House of Representatives to just a few seats.

item.title: The painful questions for Nato and the EU as Trump threatens Greenland
item.description: Were Trump to make good on his ambition to bring Greenland under US control, would it mark not just an existential threat to Nato but also a major cri...
